private int decodeRemainingLength(ByteBuf in) {

        value += (encodedByte & 0x7F) * multiplier; // å–ä½ 7 ä½æ•¸æ“šä¸¦ä¹˜ä»¥ç•¶å‰ä¹˜æ•¸
        multiplier *= 128;                          // ä¹˜æ•¸éå¢ (128^1, 128^2, ...)

    return value;
}

TlMqttConnectVariableHead decodeVariableHeader(ByteBuf buf) {

    int protocolNameLen = buf.readUnsignedShort(); // é•·åº¦åŸŸ (2 å­—ç¯€)

    // 2. å”è­°ç‰ˆæœ¬ (e.g., 4 for MQTT 3.1.1)
    short protocolVersion = buf.readUnsignedByte();

            + "WillFlag=[{}], WillQos=[{}], WillRetain=[{}], ç”¨æˆ¶åæ¨™èªŒ=[{}], å¯†ç¢¼æ¨™èªŒ=[{}], KeepAlive=[{}]",
